text: Do I really need this item?
subText: A packet  yes. But not 5 unless your parents are out for vacation and you’ve to make do with stockable food.

text: How would this item improve my day-to-day life?
subText: Mushrooms are delicious but also nutritious with fiber and vitamins.

text: Why am I really buying this item? Is it because of my peers? Is it because of an ad? Is it because of my own understanding of my needs?
subText: Buying just because I can stock this item and eating it is easy as it’s already ready-to-eat.

text: Is this item stockable? If not, do I really need 5 items?
subText: No. Mushrooms are not stockable unless frozen. You don’t need five items unless cooking for a family dinner with guests.
Good quality mushrooms can cost anywhere from $5 to $15 a packet, based on the variety of mushrooms you’re getting.
